channel.title: friday on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in friday on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Friday
item.description: 10:22 Friday 26 July 2019 JST Nice meditation this morning and just finished an online group meeting for Integration Group Coordinators. It went well, though some “summaries” from small groups seemed like they may be as long as the originals. I wanna do some work for AB, ConSwi, TEDx, and meditation.

item.title: friday
item.description: Late late Friday Dec 27, 1991 (transcribed from Book Two of my diary) I’m mostly caught up on the house & the budget. I forgot to log one check of mine, so that’s on hold for a while (until my next statement) Tomorrow I’m going to play racquetball with Mr Bandecca. That will be cool. Later. Love Rob
